name: Green Dude (Dilligaf 420 (aka Gullberg))
description:
Green Dude is a lofi pixelart 2d puzzle action aventure game.

It´s inspired by similar games from Nes, C64, windows 3,x games with gameboy-colorpalette.

I try to focus on good gameplay and enjoyment of the game rather than staying hardcore-true to oldschool. 

Right now it´s only Windows PC-runtime format. But I aim to release on several platforms in future.
